sourcesContent:
const colors = {
  primary: '#DC0A2D',
  secondary: '#0449A8',

  primaryDarken: '#A80221',
  secondaryDarken: '#0187D9',
  secondaryLight: '#039ADA',

  yellow: '#FED007',
  green: '#5B9737',
  poison: '#006727',
  brown: '#964B00',
  darkGreen: '#388E3C',
  lightGreen: '#8BC34A',
  lemonGreen: '#827717',
  red: '#E50000',
  lightBlue: '#81D4FA',
  blue: '#4358B1',

  light: '#f3f3f3',
  white: '#fff',
  grey: '#D9D9D9',
  coolGrey: '#212121',

  regular: '#333',

  shadow: 'rgba(223, 234, 235, 0.3)',
};

export default colors;
